title: csrf_token
content: # `prefect.server.api.csrf_token` ## Functions ### `create_csrf_token` ```python theme={null} create_csrf_token(db: PrefectDBInterface = Depends(provide_database_interface), client: str = Query(..., description='The client to create a CSRF token for')) -> schemas.core.CsrfToken ``` Create or update a CSRF token for a client
